description: MainActivity Kotlin source file for an Android application that manages note listing and editing fragments, with toolbar setup and back navigation handling.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class hosting notes list and note editor fragments, handling toolbar and back navigation.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets theme, content view, toolbar, and manages initial fragment setup.

methods.name: openEditor
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with NoteEditorFragment for editing a specific note, adding the transaction to the back stack.

methods.name: closeEditor
methods.description: Pops the editor fragment off the back stack, returning to the notes list.
